summary: A test suite that verifies the correct loading, configuration handling, datatype support, and inference results of a Stable Diffusion XL ControlNet pipeline when using a single-file checkpoint, comparing its behavior against the standard pretrained model.
business_intent: Guarantee that the single-file checkpoint format for Stable Diffusion XL ControlNet can be reliably integrated into production pipelines, ensuring compatibility, deterministic behavior, and parity in generated outputs across different settings and hardware.
